attributes.description:
CHOICE OF 2
This is a 2019 Datsun Go 1.2 Lux, It looks good and delivers itself very well. The vehicle comes with power steering, air conditioning, front electric windows and radio/CD/USB and nice legroom for both driver and rear passengers. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
 The vehicle has been reduced from 139 995 to 129 995.

Inside, a near-perfect driving position, an elegant dashboard and solid controls immediately demonstrate that the A1 is a classy car, much in the mould of its bigger brothers. Refinement is top notch and you’re well insulated from wind and road noise, even at higher speeds.

This A1 comes with a set of BRAND NEW tyres and is in an all-round immaculate condition!

In-house financing within an hour. Deliveries Nationwide. Trade-ins welcome. Call today for this amazing car!
